Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“Real battle is the way to go...”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Yo, what are you doin’!?{Line} We shouldn’t be going back!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Yo, what are you doin’!?{Line} We shouldn’t be going back!”

Monologue.Current: “Территория находится под контролем{Line} отряда «Гамма»...”{Next}“Мы еле пробились сюда.{Line} Пострайтесь и за нас, ребята!”
Monologue.Original: “Squad C’s in charge here.{Line} Leave the rest to us...”{Next}“...Is what I really wanna say,{Line} but we’re not that strong. Go for it, guys!”

Monologue.Current: “Одного из наших стошнило...”{Next}“Нет... {Pause 80}Не подумай, мы тут не едим!”
Monologue.Original: “One of our members got sick.{Line} We’re shorthanded...”{Next}“Uh... {Pause 80}It’s not like we’re sick{Line} ’cause we had a bite to eat here.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Run while we still have the chance!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Run while we still have the chance!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“YO! What are you doin’!?{Line} C’mon, let’s go!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“YO! What are you doin’!?{Line} C’mon, let’s go!”
